revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Thecus |model=N2100 |revision= |asin=B001J54B64 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=80219;FW80219M600; |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F128J3D75 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622ETP-D43 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0, SATA |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, 9-pin header |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8110SB |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8110SB |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Hardware Monitor IC;Fintek;F75375S;;1; ,,, I2C Real Time Clock;Richoh;RS5C372A;;1; ,,, 4-port USB 2.0 Host Controller;VIA;VT6212L;;1; ,,, 2-port PCI SATA Controller;Silicon Image;Sil3512;;1; ,,, 16-bit I2C-bus LED dimmer;Phillips;PCA9532PW;;1; ,,, Field programmable clock synthesizer;IDT;ICS345R;;1; ,,, DDR Termination Regulator;National Semiconductor;LP2994;;1; ,,, Programmable High Density PLD;Lattice Semiconductor;LC4064V;;1; ,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3243C;;1; ,,, Dual PWM Controller with DDR Option;Intersil;ISL6539;;1; ,,, 5A Low dropout linear regulator;Anpec;APL5912;;1; ,,, Serial EEPROM;unknown;93CC46;;2; |flags=fan, RTC w/ battery backup |stock_boot=RedBoot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.9; |tp_firmware=Debian, DietPC, OpenBSD |default_ip=192.168.1.100 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:14:FD }} :[http://www.thecus.com/product.php?PROD_ID=1 Product page]
RAM is via DDR DIMM socket which can be upgraded to a 512MB DIMM.
<!-- *[http://naswebsite.com/wiki/Products ''NAS Website''] XXX --> *[https://web.archive.org/web/20190401004319/http://thecus.nas-central.org/wiki/Category:N2100 ''NAS Central'' Wiki] *[http://www.cyrius.com/debian/iop/n2100/install.html ''Installing Debian'' Wiki]
===Specifications=== :;Thecus NAS N2100 *CPU: [[Intel]] 80219 (FW80219M600) @600MHz *Flash: [[Intel]] TE28F128 ROM (16MB) *RAM: 128/256MB (DDR400, upgradable) *LAN: 2x GbE ([[Realtek]] RTL8110SB) *USB: 3x USB 2.0 ports ([[VIA]] VT6212L) *SATA Controller: [[Silicon Image]] Sil3512 (ECTU128) *HW Mon: ''Fintek'' F75375S (HW monitoring, fan control) :LED Dimmer: Philips PCA9532 :Serial Controller: TA550C :Fan: ''ADDA'' AD0412MB-G76 :RTC: ''Ricoh'' RS5C372A (I2C) *Ports: 1x Mini PCI slot, 8x GPIO pinouts *HDD: 2x SATA hard disk capacity (int.) :Drive Capacity: Usually ships barebones <small> The exact same hardware used in the Thecus N2100 can also be found in the following devices: *ARP Datacon NAS-2100 • Allnet ALL6500 • Evesham SilverSTOR M-Box </small> ===Models=== <small> *'''Thecus N2100''': @600MHz IOP CPU, 2x SATA, DDR RAM, 3x USB 2.0, 2x GbE LAN, miniPCI. :This device is also sold by [[Allnet ALL6500]] and [[Evesham SilverSTOR M-Box]]. *'''IO-Data GLAN Tank''': @400MHz IOP CPU, 2x IDE, 128MB RAM, 4x USB 2.0, 1x GbE LAN. :Other devices from IO-Data: HDL-Gxxx, HDL-GWxxx, and HDL-GZxxx series, are very similar. *'''Intel SS4000-E''': @400MHz IOP CPU, 4x SATA, 256MB RAM (exp.), 2x USB 2.0, 2x GbE LAN. :Intel (Baxter Creek) SS4000-E design by Lanner, NAS appliances NS04-4100 and NS04-4110. </small>
===See also=== :;[https://web.archive.org/web/20190404184156/http://thecus.nas-central.org/wiki/Main_Page Thecus Variants] *[[Thecus N0204]] *[[Thecus N199]] *[[Thecus N299]] *[[Thecus N1200]] *[[Thecus NAS N2100]] <!-- N1200 *CPU: Freescale MPC8347 *RAM: 128 MB *NOR Flash: 8MB Numonyx 28F640J3D *SATA Controller: Silicon Image Sil3512 *RTC: Ricoh RS5C372A *Other: Mini-PCI slot, MCU PIC16F72 :Fintek F75375 (hardware monitoring) *NIC: Freescale dual GbE controller on SoC :Realtek RTL8211B, Marvell 88E6060 switch *USB: Freescale USB 2.0 controller on SoC, 2 ports on device *Internal HDD: Supplied barebones. Takes 2.5/3.5 inch SATA disks. *Fan: 30 mm at bottom of case The Thecus N1200 has the notable addition of a four port fast ethernet switch and a Mini-PCI slot :for wireless on top of the standard features you would expect in a NAS device --> *[[Thecus N2200]] *[[Thecus N3200]] *[[Thecus N4100]] *[[Thecus N4100+]] *[[Thecus N4100PRO]] *[[Thecus N5200]] *[[Thecus N5200PRO]] *[[Thecus 1U4500]]
*[[Intel Entry Storage System SS4000-E]] - 4-bay NAS :CPU: [[Intel XScale]] 80219 @400MHz
__NOTOC__
